column5: Hi All,  Well its raining ice here today, so cant get anything done outside...let alone go fishing, house is clean...so just spending time with the young boy this morning....he's a real character!   Was snapping pics of him goofing around and got these 2 this morning about an hour ago.  Just thought the first pic was a classic, lol....that look......watch out ladies! Its just he needs to work on the pucker when going in for the kiss....lololol   HE'S GOT THE LOOK NO PROBLEM         MIGHT HAVE TO DO A LITTLE WORK WHEN MOVING IN FOR THE KISS....LOL
ROFL!!! Too funny...thanks for that...I needed it
He's getting BIG Simon!! He should be drilling holes before the end of the season at this rate!!  S.

Too funny Simon. Thx for sharing. Your kids really don't have to do much to put a smile on your face do they  Try to remember just how darn cute cuddly and innocent they where when they become teenagers   It helps to get you through it.
